Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1911493294073597952/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Heartwarming Youtube Short Story | 100% Unique"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1911493294073597952/)_"
---
Act as an expert storyteller.

Write a short 45 seconds story about [PROMPT] , but no longer! Make it emotional and heartwarming, but a little scary too in some aspects. You can put your own philosophical ideas if you feel like it. Be playful about the writing structure and word selection.

Make sure to make it unique in its own way and don't write robotic so that other AI Detector can detect the text as ai generated. Don't use complicated words! Make the readability 5th grade level, so non-English speakers can also understand!

All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

At the end, always add a call to action link in paragraph format "Get Access Now: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aigpt4 "
